Vintasoft.Imaging.Annotation.dll is the main assembly of VintaSoft Annotation .NET Plug-in and
it contains classes for annotating images in .NET. Also assembly contains classes for displaying,
printing and visual processing of images with annotations in WinForms.



VintaSoft Annotation .NET Plug-in is the add-on for VintaSoft Imaging .NET SDK,
which allows to annotate TIFF, PNG, JPEG, DICOM images and PDF documents in .NET.

GENERAL FEATURES
- The plug-in is a pure .NET library written in C#
- AnyCPU, x86 and x64 mode support
- Annotate and markup single- or multipage TIFF image, JPEG or PNG image without re-encoding the image
- Annotate and markup DICOM image without re-encoding the image - VintaSoft DICOM .NET Plug-in is necessary
- Annotate and markup PDF document without re-encoding the PDF document - VintaSoft PDF .NET Plug-in is necessary
- Create new annotation collection
- Load annotation collection from annotation packet stored in image metadata, PDF page metadata or separately
- Associate annotation collection with image or PDF page
- Add or insert an annotation into annotation collection
- Reorder annotations in annotation collection
- Change annotation
- Remove an annotation from annotation collection
- Undo/redo changes in annotation collection or single annotation
- Rotate image with annotation collection
- Burn annotation collection on image
- Print image with annotation collection
- Save annotation collection into annotation packet stored in image metadata, PDF page metadata or separately
- Save annotation collection into PDF document with PDF annotation appearance (annotation will be visible in any PDF viewer) - VintaSoft PDF .NET Plug-in is necessary 


DEVELOPMENT REQUIREMENTS
- VintaSoft Imaging .NET SDK
- Development environments: Microsoft Visual Studio .NET 2005, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2013, 2015, 2017
- Programming languages: VB.NET, C#, any .NET compatible language
- Development platforms: .NET, WinForms, WPF, ASP.NET WebForms, ASP.NET MVC


DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS
- VintaSoft Imaging .NET SDK
- Microsoft Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (32-bit and 64-bit)
- Microsoft Windows Server 2003, 2008, 2012 (32-bit and 64-bit)
- Microsoft .NET Framework: 2.0, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 4.6, 4.7
